extension.author: JoomlaWorks
extension.copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 - 2020 JoomlaWorks Ltd. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Provides URL normalization & other features for Joomla.

field.name: originDomain
field.label: Define the origin domains (one below the other - do not use http:// or https://)
field.description: Don't use http:// or https:// in front of each origin domain or subdomain. Place each entry in a separate line. You can define a domain or subdomain port as well.

field.name: cdnDomain
field.label: Define the target domain - MUST use http:// or https://)
field.description: All origin domains & subdomains defined above with be overwritten to the target domain (thus the normalization).

field.name: redirectWithJS
field.label: Force redirect protocol
field.description: Please note that the redirection is done with JavaScript.

field.name: jsRedirectDomain
field.label: Force redirect to target domain
field.description: If a visitor directly requests one of the origin domains, a JavaScript based redirect can change the domain to the target domain defined.

field.name: browsercache
field.label: Use client-side (browser) caching
field.description: This setting instucts the browser to cache content locally.

field.name: cachetime
field.label: Cache lifetime for the home page (in mins)

field.name: cachetime_inner
field.label: Cache lifetime for every other page (in mins)
field.description: If no value is set, the 'home page' value will be used.

field.name: excludedComponents
field.label: Enter components to exclude from caching (one per line)

field.name: tidyState
field.label: Tidy state
field.description: Tidy reformats the output of the page by properly indenting code and removing inline CSS styles. The result improves client-side rendering. Use with caution. PHP's Tidy module must be precompiled with PHP.

field.name: tagsNotToStrip
field.label: Common social tags and new HTML5 tags are excluded - add your custom HTML tags here

field.name: wrap
field.label: Number of characters after which code will wrap
field.description: Enter the number of characters after which the code will be wrapped. If you want to disable this feature, clear the box or put 0If you wanna disable this feature

field.name: altText
field.label: Replacement text for empty alt tags
field.description: By default the plugin will enter 'Image' if you don't input anything.

field.name: cdataIndent
field.label: CDATA indentation
field.description: Enable indentation for code inside CDATA blocks.

field.name: breakBeforeBr
field.label: Break before br tag
field.description: This allows for better readability of code.
